title: Paakatha Enna Paakatha Lyrics Aaru
stanzas:
pogatha thalli pogaatha
enna vittuvittu
thalli thalli pogaatha

kodutha thiruppi ne ketka
kadhalum kadanumillai
kootathil ninnu paathukola
nadappadhu koothum illa

pogatha thalli pogaatha
enna vittuvittu
thalli thalli pogaatha

venaa venaanu naan irundhen
neethaane enna iluthuvitta
podi podinu naan thoratha
vambula neethaane maativitta

nallaa irundha em manasa
naaraaga kilichuputta
karuppaa irundha en irava
color-a maathiputta

ennudan nadandha en nizhala
thaniya nadakkavitta
ulla irundha en usura
veliye midhakkavitta

pogatha thalli pogaatha
enna vittuvittu
thalli thalli pogaatha

Venaa venanu nenaikalaye
naanum unna verukalaiye
kaanom kaanomnu nee thaeda
kadhal onnum tholaiyalaye

onna irundha niyabagatha
nenjodu serthu vachen
thaniya irukkum valiya mattum
thaniya anubavichen

paravaiyin siragu prinjaathan
vaanathil adhu parakkum
kaathirundhaal thaan
iruvarukkum kadhal arigarikkum

pogatha thalli pogaatha
enna vittuvittu
thalli thalli pogaatha
